description.bulgarian: Удари лъскавата си нова голф топка.
description.english: Hit your shiny new golf ball.
description.italian: Colpisci la tua nuova e magnifica pallina.
description.polish: Uderz swoją lśniącą, nową piłkę golfową.
description.schinese: 击打你崭新的高尔夫球。

description.bulgarian: Спечели двубой.
description.english: Win a match.
description.italian: Vinci una partita.
description.polish: Wygraj rozgrywkę.
description.schinese: 赢得一场比赛。

description.bulgarian: Спечели дупка.
description.english: Win a hole.
description.italian: Vinci una Buca.
description.polish: Wygraj dołek.
description.schinese: 赢下一个球洞。

description.bulgarian: Спечели 10 мача.
description.english: Win 10 matches.
description.italian: Vinci 10 partite.
description.polish: Wygraj 10 rozgrywek.
description.schinese: 赢得10场比赛。

description.bulgarian: Спечели 20 мача.
description.english: Win 20 matches.
description.italian: Vinci 20 partite.
description.polish: Wygraj 20 rozgrywek.
description.schinese: 赢得20场比赛。

description.bulgarian: Спечели 30 мача.
description.english: Win 30 matches.
description.italian: Vinci 30 partite.
description.polish: Wygraj 30 rozgrywek.
description.schinese: 赢得30场比赛。

description.bulgarian: Спечели 40 мача.
description.english: Win 40 matches.
description.italian: Vinci 40 partite.
description.polish: Wygraj 40 rozgrywek.
description.schinese: 赢得40场比赛。

description.bulgarian: Сблъскай се с 100 други играча.
description.english: Collide with 100 players.
description.italian: Scontrati con i giocatori 100 volte.
description.polish: Wpadnij w kolizję ze 100 graczami.
description.schinese: 与100名玩家发生碰撞。

description.bulgarian: Удари топката 1000 пъти.
description.english: Hit your ball 1000 times.
description.italian: Colpisci la tua pallina 1000 volte.
description.polish: Uderz swoją piłkę 1000 razy.
description.schinese: 击打你的球1000次。

description.bulgarian: Спечели 150 дупки.
description.english: Win 150 holes.
description.italian: Vinci 150 Buche.
description.polish: Wygraj 150 dołków.
description.schinese: 赢下150个球洞。

description.bulgarian: Завърши дупка без да се докоснеш до нито един друг играч.
description.english: Finish a hole without colliding with any player.
description.italian: Finisci una Buca senza scontrarti con altri giocatori.
description.polish: Ukończ dołek bez kolizji z innym graczem.
description.schinese: 在不与任何玩家发生碰撞的前提下完成一个球洞。

description.bulgarian: Спечели дупка без да се докоснеш до нито един друг играч.
description.english: Win a hole without colliding with any player.
description.italian: Vinci una Buca senza scontrarti con altri giocatori.
description.polish: Wygraj dołek bez kolizji z innym graczem.
description.schinese: 在不与任何玩家发生碰撞的前提下赢下一个球洞。

description.bulgarian: Спечели дупка на Гладна голф количка
description.english: Win a round of Hungry Golf Cart.
description.italian: Vinci un round di Golf Cart Affamato.
description.polish: Wygraj rundę Głodnego Wózka Golfowego.
description.schinese: 赢得一局“饥饿的高尔夫球车”模式。

description.bulgarian: Измини 100 метра в Пътна ярост
description.english: Reach at least 100m in Road Rage.
description.italian: Raggiungi almeno 100m in Furia Stradale.
description.polish: Pokonaj przynajmniej 100m w Ulicznej Wściekłości.
description.schinese: 在“路怒症”模式中至少前进100米。

description.bulgarian: Завърши Сумо дупка без да бъдеш елиминиран.
description.english: Finish Sumo without being eliminated.
description.italian: Finisci un round di Sumo senza essere eliminato.
description.polish: Ukończ Sumo bez bycia wyeliminowanym.
description.schinese: 在不被淘汰的前提下完成“相扑”模式的比赛。

description.bulgarian: Получи максималния възможен брой точки в Краля на хълма.
description.english: Get the maximum amount of points possible in a round of King of the Hill.
description.italian: Ottieni il massimo di punti possibile in Re della Collina.
description.polish: Zdobądź maksymalną możliwą liczbę punktów w rudzie Króla Wzgórza.
description.schinese: 在“山丘之王”模式中获得可能取得最高分数。

description.bulgarian: Хвани бомбата поне 5 пъти в рунд на Подай бомбата
description.english: Grab the bomb at least 5 times during Pass the Bomb.
description.italian: Ottieni la bomba almeno 5 volte in un round di Passa la Bomba.
description.polish: Złap bombę przynajmniej 5 razy w Gorącym Ziemniaku.
description.schinese: 在“击鼓传炸弹”模式中至少拿到炸弹5次。

description.bulgarian: Спечели състезание.
description.english: Win a race.
description.italian: Vinci una Gara.
description.polish: Wygraj Wyścig.
description.schinese: 赢得一场“竞速”模式。

description.bulgarian: Бъди един от последните двама оцелели в Динамитения рид. Рундът трябва да има поне 4 играча.
description.english: Survive Boom Ridge until only you and 1 other player remain.  Requires at least 4 players.
description.italian: Sopravvivi in Zona Esplosiva fino a che non rimani solo con un altro giocatore. Richiede almeno 4 giocatori.
description.polish: Przetrwaj na Wybuchowej Grani tak długo, aż zostaniesz ty i jeden inny gracz.  Wymaga conajmniej 4 graczy.
description.schinese: 在“爆炸山脊”模式中，生存到只剩下你与另一名玩家。需要至少4名玩家。

displayName.bulgarian: Какъв чудесен ден да си кутия

description.bulgarian: Счупи поне 15 кутии в един рунд на Кашонотрошачка.
description.english: Smash at least 15 crates in a single Whack-A-Crate.
description.italian: Distruggi almeno 15 casse in un singolo round di Spaccatutto.
description.polish: Zniszcz conajmniej 15 skrzyń podczas jednej rozgrywki w Rozwal Skrzynię.
description.schinese: 在一局“敲箱子”模式中砸碎至少15个箱子。

description.bulgarian: Задръж знамето за поне 40 секунди без да го губиш в Плени флага.
description.english: Hold the flag for 40 seconds without losing it in Capture the Flag.
description.italian: Tieni la bandiera per almeno 40 secondi consecutivi in Cattura la Bandiera.
description.polish: Trzymaj flagę bez utraty przez 40 sekund w Przejmij Flagę.
description.schinese: 在“夺旗”模式中持有旗帜40秒且不丢失。

description.bulgarian: Завърши рунд на Криеница като криещ се без да бъдеш елиминиран.
description.english: Finish Hide and Seek as a Hider without being eliminated.
description.italian: Finisci Nascondino senza essere eliminato.
description.polish: Ukończ Grę w Chowanego jako chowający się bez bycia wyeliminowanym.
description.schinese: 在“捉迷藏”模式中作为隐藏者完成游戏且一次都不被发现。

description.bulgarian: Задействай поне 15 бомби в един рунд на Експлозивен футбол.
description.english: Activate at least 15 bombs during a single round of Explosive Soccer.
description.italian: Attiva almeno 15 bombe in un singolo round di Calcio Esplosivo.
description.polish: Aktywuj conajmniej 15 bomb podczas jednej rundy Wybuchowej Piłki Nożnej.
description.schinese: 在一局“炸弹足球”模式中激活至少15个炸弹。

description.bulgarian: Бъди преследван от Гладната голф количка за поне 15 секунди в един рунд.
description.english: Be chased by the Hungry Golf Cart for at least 15 seconds in a single round.
description.italian: Fatti inseguire dal Golf Cart affamato per almeno 15 secondi in un singolo round.
description.polish: Bądź ścigany przez Głodny Wózek Golfowy przez conajmniej 15 sekund w jednej rundzie.
description.schinese: 在一局中被饥饿的高尔夫球车追逐至少15秒。

description.bulgarian: Бъди единственият който завършва състезание успешно.
description.english: Be the only player that finishes a Race.
description.italian: Sii l'unico giocatore a finire una Gara.
description.polish: Bądź jedynym graczem, który ukońcczył Wyścig.
description.schinese: 成为“竞速”模式中唯一完成比赛的玩家。

description.bulgarian: Отстрани 4 други играча в един рунд на Час пик.
description.english: Eliminate 4 other players in a single round of Rush Hour.
description.italian: Elimina 4 giocatori in un singolo round di Ora di Punta.
description.polish: Wyeliminuj 4 innych graczy w jednej rundzie Godzin Szczytu.
description.schinese: 在一局“交通高峰”模式中淘汰4名其他玩家。

description.bulgarian: Събери 10 звезди.
description.english: Collect 10 powerups.
description.italian: Raccogli 10 potenziamenti.
description.polish: Zbierz 10 doładowań.
description.schinese: 收集10个强化道具。

description.bulgarian: Събери 100 звезди.
description.english: Collect 100 powerups.
description.italian: Raccogli 100 potenziamenti.
description.polish: Zbierz 100 doładowań.
description.schinese: 收集100个强化道具。

description.bulgarian: Събери 1000 звезди.
description.english: Collect 1000 powerups.
description.italian: Raccogli 1000 potenziamenti.
description.polish: Zbierz 1000 doładowań.
description.schinese: 收集1000个强化道具。

description.bulgarian: Отстрани 3 играча с един удар в Чукобол.
description.english: Eliminate 3 players in a single strike in Hammerball.
description.italian: Elimina 3 giocatori in un singolo round di Palla Demolitrice.
description.polish: Wyeliminuj w graczy podczas jednego rzutu w Zbijaku.
description.schinese: 在“链球”模式中，一次击球淘汰3名玩家。

description.bulgarian: Удари Чукотопката 50 пъти.
description.english: Hit the Hammerball 50 times.
description.italian: Colpisci la palla demolitrice 50 volte.
description.polish: Uderz piłkę w Zbijaku 50 razy.
description.schinese: 击打链球50次。

description.bulgarian: Спечели рунд на Ветровити покриви без да станеш жертва на вятъра.
description.english: Win a round of Windy Tops without falling victim to the wind.
description.italian: Vinci un round di Cime Ventose senza cadere.
description.polish: Wygraj rundę Wichrowych Wzgórz bez zostania ofiarą wiatru.
description.schinese: 赢得一局“狂风之巅”模式且不被狂风吹落。

description.bulgarian: Насочи 100 овце към кошарата си.
description.english: Herd 100 sheep back to your pen.
description.italian: Porta 100 pecore nel tuo recinto in Pastorizia.
description.polish: Zagoń 100 owiec z powrotem do swojej zagrody.
description.schinese: 将100只羊赶回你的围栏。

description.bulgarian: Насочи 3 големи овце към кошарата си в един рунд на Овцелов.
description.english: Herd 3 large sheep back to your pen in a single round of Sheep Tag.
description.italian: Porta 3 pecore giganti nel tuo recinto in un singolo round di Pastorizia.
description.polish: Zagoń 3 duże owce do swojej zagrody w jednej rundzie Owczego Pędu.
description.schinese: 在一局“牧羊”模式中将3只大羊赶回你的围栏。

description.bulgarian: Задръж се в светлината за поне 20 секунди без да я напускаш в рунд на Прожектор.
description.english: Stay in the light for at least 20 seconds without leaving it in Spotlight.
description.italian: Rimani per 20 secondi consecutivi all'interno della luce in Centro dell'Attenzione.
description.polish: Zostań w oświetlonym obszarze bez opuszczania go przez 20 sekund w Blasku Reflektorów.
description.schinese: 在“聚光灯”模式中，持续停留在灯光下至少20秒。

description.bulgarian: Всички играчи трябва да оцелеят поне 20 секунди в рунд на Прокълнатото имение. Рундът трябва да има поне 4 играча.
description.english: All players must survive for at least 20 seconds in the Haunted Mansion. Requires at least 4 players.
description.italian: Tutti i giocatori devono sopravvivere almeno 20 secondi in Villa Infestata. Richiede almeno 4 giocatori.
description.polish: Wszyscy gracze muszą przetrwać przynajmniej 20 sekund w Nawiedzonej Posiadłości. Wymaga conajmniej 4 graczy.
description.schinese: 所有玩家必须在“闹鬼公馆”模式中生存至少20秒。需要至少4名玩家。

description.bulgarian: Скочи над 60 пъти в един и същ рунд.
description.english: Jump over 60 times in a single hole.
description.italian: Salta più di 60 volte nello stesso round.
description.polish: Skocz conajmniej 60 razy przy jednym dołku.
description.schinese: 在一个球洞中跳跃超过60次。

description.bulgarian: Изпълни 20 мисии.
description.english: Complete 20 Quests.
description.italian: Completa 20 missioni.
description.polish: Wykonaj 20 zadań.
description.schinese: 完成20个任务。

description.bulgarian: Събери всички достъпни Нормални, Редки и Епични шапки.
description.english: Collect all available Common, Rare and Epic hats.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i cappelli comuni, rari ed epici.
description.polish: Zbierz wszystkie pospolite, rzadkie i epickie czapki.
description.schinese: 收集所有可用的普通、稀有和史诗品质帽子。

description.bulgarian: Събери 30 козметични предмета.
description.english: Collect 30 cosmetics.
description.italian: Ottini 30 oggetti estetici.
description.polish: Zbierz 30 przedmiotów kosmetycznych.
description.schinese: 收集30件自定义装扮。

description.bulgarian: Достигни общо 20 точки в една игра.
description.english: Achieve a total of 20 scorecard points.
description.italian: Accumula un totale di 20 punti.
description.polish: Uzyskaj razem 20 punktów na karcie punktowej.
description.schinese: 累计获得20点记分卡分数。

description.bulgarian: Достигни общо 200 точки в една игра.
description.english: Achieve a total of 200 scorecard points.
description.italian: Accumula un totale di 200 punti.
description.polish: Uzyskaj razem 200 punktów na karcie punktowej.
description.schinese: 累计获得200点记分卡分数。

description.bulgarian: Достигни общо 500 точки в една игра.
description.english: Achieve a total of 500 scorecard points.
description.italian: Accumula un totale di 500 punti.
description.polish: Uzyskaj razem 500 punktów na karcie punktowej.
description.schinese: 累计获得500点记分卡分数。

description.bulgarian: Спечели рунд на Голф курс.
description.english: Win a round of Driving Range.
description.italian: Vinci un round in Campo Pratica.
description.polish: Wygraj rundę Zamkniętego Toru.
description.schinese: 赢得一局“练习场”模式。

description.bulgarian: Спечели игра на Труден режим.
description.english: Win a match in Hard Mode.
description.italian: Vinci una partita in modalità Difficile.
description.polish: Wygraj rozgrywkę w trybie trudnym.
description.schinese: 在困难模式下赢得一场比赛。
